text: Abilio James Acosta (born April 17, 1971) is an American journalist. He was born in Washington, D.C.. He is currently the chief White House correspondent for CNN. Acosta was the national political correspondent for CNN. ==References== ==Other websites== * CNN Profile * Jim Acostaâ€™s Cuba Blog at CNN * * Category:1971 births Category:Living people Category:CNN people Category:American political commentators Category:Journalists from Washington, D.C.
title: Jim Acosta
